articles.content:
Encouraging police brutality and other forms violence is one of Donald Trump's favorite things to do.
In a 2017 speech, Donald Trump told police: "Please don't be too nice" to suspected criminals. … [+11451 chars]

articles.title: Lady Gaga: Chromatica | Review - Pitchfork
articles.description: With incomparable flair, the pop diva returns to her dance-pop days with a fabulously fun and deeply personal album that is at turns bizarre, theatrical, and ambitious.
articles.content: Lady Gaga has canceled Earth. She lives on planet Chromatica now. Yes, this is Stefani Germanottas return to all that is Lady Gaga: bizarre and theatrical and ambitious, swathed in electrodes, operat… [+7019 chars]

articles.title: Kylie Jenner Is Furious With Kris Jenner and Refuses to Take Her Calls Amid Billionaire Scandal, Source Reveals - Showbiz Cheat Sheet
articles.description: Kylie Jenner is furious by Forbes report that she lied about being a billionaire. Now, a source says she refuses to speak to Kris Jenner.
articles.content: The KarJenners are used to being at the center of controversy and scandals. Since their long-running reality series, Keeping Up With the Kardashians first premiered in 2007, the entire family has dea… [+4096 chars]

articles.author: Lynette Rice
articles.title: Herb Stempel, the whistleblower portrayed in 'Quiz Show,' dies at 93 - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: As a contestant on NBC's Twenty-One in 1956, Stempel went public with the revelation that he was given the answers to questions.
articles.content:
Herb Stempel, the infamous Queens man who exposed how the NBC game show Twenty-One was built on lies and deceit, has died. He was 93.
His April 7 death was confirmed to the New York Times by his for… [+2425 chars]
